# The CPU versions of torch and torch visions are used due to their size being
# several GB smaller which made a large impact on the performance of CI
# (through build artifacts and caching)
torch @ https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-2.7.0%2Bcpu-cp310-cp310-manylinux_2_28_x86_64.whl#sha256=c98c4f48f42a2237e079f3de48e8549de2c8cf68cdcf2041564c7794bbce0b59 ; python_version == "3.10"
